column1: When is reading week? | Fall 2020: October 13th
How many first year courses are we allowed to take? | Prior to September 2020
column2: 6.0 credits for 100-level courses would count towards your degree. But currently
column3: you can check how many 100-level courses count towards your degree and other specifications through the Degree Explorer tool accessible through ACORN under "Academics" > "Planning Tools".
